recipe.title: Coconut Lime Sorbet
ingredients: a 15-ounce can cream of coconut (preferably Coco Lopez)
instructions: In a bowl whisk together ingredients. Freeze mixture in an ice-cream maker. Transfer sorbet to an airtight container and put in freezer to harden.
